thread.title: Chipmaker Microsemi offers to buy PMC-Sierra in $2.4 bln deal
thread.title_full: Chipmaker Microsemi offers to buy PMC-Sierra in $2.4 bln deal | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Chipmaker Microsemi offers to buy PMC-Sierra in $2.4 bln deal
text:
Oct 19 Chipmaker Microsemi Corp said it had offered to buy chipmaker PMC-Sierra Inc in a deal valued at about $2.4 billion.
Microsemi's offer of $11.50 per share represents a premium of about 12 percent to PMC's Friday close.
Apple Inc supplier Skyworks Solutions Inc said on Oct. 5 that it would buy PMC-Sierra for $2 billion in cash. (Reporting by Kshitiz Goliya in Bengaluru; Editing by Kirti Pandey)
